snippet.title: Canvas Hockey Trailer
snippet.description:
#CanvasHockey #Trailer #LocalMultiplayer #Synvoyity
Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351400/Canvas_Hockey/

Canvas Hockey is a top-down, arcade style Hockey party game. Team up with friends in local multiplayer for 1v1 or 2v2 battles, or set up custom Tournaments for up to 12 players. You can also start a single player Career, where you start at the bottom (Bronze league) and work your way up to the top (CHL elite). Manage your roster by trading your partner and goalie, or if your team is losing, trade yourself! Keep track of all of your stats and team history in this endless Career mode, as the A.I. progressively get faster and more skilled as you move up the leagues!

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351400/Canvas_Hockey/

Join the Discord!
https://discord.gg/b5AN7H2

Visit our Website!
https://synvoyity.com/canvashockey/
